[Cooperative Nature](/Feats.aspx?ID=67) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>

The short human life span lends perspective and has taught you from a young age to set aside differences and work with others to achieve greatness. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on checks to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75).

<title level="2">Cooperative Nature leads to...</title>
[Cooperative Soul](/Feats.aspx?ID=75)
